data.name: College Craze
data.detailed_description:
Welcome to Sugardale, a mid-sized college town and home of prestigious Sugardale University. You play as an incoming female freshman, ready to make your mark on the world.

Choose to study hard, work off-campus, or party every weekend. Manage your grades, followers, and bank account as you meet and interact with the 15 (and counting!) unique characters of Sugardale.

Create your own story and get into steamy situations, all while helping (or sabotaging) your friends, keeping secrets, and revealing mysteries about the town's shady happenings.






Ever want to see yourself in your games? Customize your character's skin tone, hair color, and hairstyle. See those changes appear in CGs throughout the game!






Characters around you don't forget about what you've done. So be careful about what you do, what you say, and who you interact with. Not all paths lead to victory.






  • Anal
  • Exhibitionism
  • Gloryhole
  • MMF Threesome

  • FFF Threesome

  • Mild BDSM

  • Vanilla MF

  • Voyeurism

  • Sugar-relationships
  • First-time

data.short_description: College Craze is an adult dating sim and life simulation game. With a branching story structure, custom female character, and over 25 love interests, you'll find endless sexy possibilities for your own college experience at Sugardale U. You won't find any fade-to-black scenes here, so enroll today!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 and higher
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6
  • Processor: 1Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GPU able to show images
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+ or Kernel 3.x+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

data.legal_notice: The story, all names, characters, and incidents portrayed in this game are fictitious. No identification with actual persons (living or deceased), places, buildings, and products is intended or should be inferred.

content_descriptors.notes: Explicit visual and written descriptions of sex and sexual scenarios. There are depictions of drug and alcohol abuse, as well as depictions of stalking.
